DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate ability plasma alpha-GST measurement liver donor ( time organ removal ) predict primary dysfunction liver recipient . The secondary objective study relationship alpha-GST level plasma liver transplant recipient early graft function recovery .
DOC.detailed_description: Graft primary dysfunction ( PDF ) liver transplantation enhance increase use extended-criteria allograft . This complication burden high mortality morbidity rate among liver transplant recipient . Alpha-GST short-life hepatocyte enzyme may interest biomarker liver injury . A recently developped ELISA technique may allow fast easy measurement alpha-GST plasma concentration ( Fastpack IP α-GST Immunoassay , Qualigen Inc. , Carlsbad , CA ) . This study aim evaluate ability plasma alpha-GST measurement liver donor predict PDF liver recipient . Methods : Observational study conduct one center ( Beaujon hospital , APHP , Clichy , France ) . Measurements plasma level alpha-GST use Fastpack IP α-GST Immunoassay ( Qualigen Inc. , Carlsbad , CA ) time organ removal liver donor daily day 0 day 7 liver transplantation recipient .
DOC.criteria: age > 18 year undergo liver transplantation Beaujon hospital ( APHP , Clichy , France ) age > 70 year < 18 year
